rules.to: SELECT client_id, max_temp, min_temp, max_hum, min_hum, max_pres, min_pres, max_qua FROM visualisation_p.client_info;
select user_id,client_id from user as u join selected_clients as sc on u.id = sc.user_id;

name: Generate notifications
User objects
Notification filter
SQL query
func:
const notif = msg.payload

const SQL = `INSERT INTO notification (time, user_id, client_id, type, value, message, importance) VALUES (time(now()), '${notif.user_id}', '${notif.client_id}', '${notif.type}', '${notif.value}', '${notif.message}', '${notif.importance}');`

msg.topic = SQL

return msg

name: Set telegram chat id for user
Prepare Telegram
Prepare email
Prepare Query
func:
msg.topic = `SELECT * FROM notification_settings WHERE telegram_key = ${msg.payload.content}`

return msg;

const query = 
`
INSERT INTO client_data
(
client_id,
temperature,
humidity,
pressure,
resistance,
bed
)
VALUES
(
${msg.payload},
${Math.round(Math.random() * 10 + 15).toFixed(2)},
${Math.round(Math.random() * 20 + 30).toFixed(2)},
${Math.floor(Math.random() * 100 + 950)},
${Math.floor(Math.random() * 100 + 100)},
0
);
`
msg.topic = query;

return msg;

rules.to: SELECT t1.time, t1.client_id, t2.name, t1.temperature, t1.humidity, t1.pressure, t1.resistance FROM client_data t1 INNER JOIN (SELECT Max(time) time, client_id, name FROM  client_data join (select id,name from all_clients) as ac on client_id = ac.id GROUP BY client_id ) AS t2 ON t1.client_id = t2.client_id AND t1.time = t2.time ORDER BY time DESC;

name: UT18 - set telegram
UT19 - remove telegram
Prepare Query
func:
const telegram = msg.payload.telegram
const user_id = msg.payload.notifSettings.user_id

msg.topic = `UPDATE notification_settings SET telegram_id = ${telegram.chatId} WHERE user_id = ${user_id}`

return msg;

name: Prepare Telegram
func:
const telegram = msg.payload.telegram

let telegramObject = {}

telegramObject.chatId = telegram.chatId
telegramObject.type = "message"
telegramObject.content = "Telegram úspešne aktivovaný!"

msg.payload = telegramObject

return msg;
